description:
Lovely Whale Amy: Chevy receives a letter on her Happitat as Mell and Rin invites her and friend to play to the sea immediately. However after Chevy meets Amy, a Sour Blueberry flavored Blue Whale Zooble, is it really love at first sight? Or a serious heartbreak that is about to happen.
Toffy and Tosh: Toffy, a Coconut berry Bear Zooble came to Candy Land to play a role in an upcoming play. But after he meets Tosh, a Lemon Lime Flavored Mouse Zooble, he started to fell in love with her as he explained to the three. As Chevy and her friends notice this, they decided to play Cupid to get the two together, even if Toffy has to pretend to be a prince.

titles.title: Koi Suru Kujira no Amy / Toffy to Tosh
Lovely Whale Amy / Toffy and Tosh
恋するクジラのエイミー / トフィーとトッシュ
